body.name: Nexxus Keraphix ProteinFusion Conditioner with Keratin Protein and Black Rice for Damaged Hair 33.8 oz

features: DAMAGE REPAIR SYSTEM: Visibly heal signs of severe hair damage, when used as a system after the first use. This conditioner helps repair from within and deliver a smooth, conditioned feel.
SMOOTHING KERATIN: This conditioner for damaged hair reaches into the hair fiber to help repair from within and deliver a smooth, conditioned feel.
PROTEINFUSION BLEND: Nexxus conditioner is formulated with an exclusive ProteinFusion blend with Keratin Protein and Black Rice that helps replenish hair, leaving it revitalized and detangled.
SALON-CRAFTED HAIR CARE: Achieve salon quality results at home when you use the Nexxus Keraphix conditioner of keratin hair treatments.

SEE THE SCIENCE: Nexxus scientists used advance protein science and custom crafted our Keraphix conditioner to replenish the nutrients damaged hair loses for clinically-proven healthier looking hair in one use.
NEXXUS HAIR CARE PRODUCTS: Looking for the best shampoo and conditioner for hair repair? Nexxus Keraphix line of keratin shampoo and conditioner, plus our hair mask, restores your hair after one use.
body.description: Get the New York City salon experience at home with Nexxus Keraphix Conditioner for Damaged Hair, the first step to a powerful protein-infused keratin treatment that visibly heals signs of severe hair damage after just one use. Clinically proven to deliver internal repair to severely damaged hair from the very first use, Nexxus hair conditioner helps heal rough and brittle hair. The concentrated formula of this hair treatment for damaged hair features our highest level of proteins containing Keratin, Collagen, and Elastin. At Nexxus, we believe helping hair return to its optimal state means treating it with protein at high levels. Bleaching, chemical process, and rigorous heat styling is very harsh on hair and can severely damage it both inside and out. Using advanced protein science research and testing, Nexxus scientists identified Glutamic acid as the key amino acid hair protein loses when it is severely damaged. With this discovery, Keraphix's transformative PROTEINFUSION blend includes black rice (a rich source in Glutamic Acid) and strengthening keratin protein to create a healing ritual that delivers clinically-proven healthier looking hair in one use. The Nexxus Keraphix Healing System for Severely Damaged Hair heals visible signs of severe hair damage. Along with our Nexxus keratin deep conditioner, try our shampoo for damaged hair, and add a gel treatment or revitalizing hair mask. We’ve created possibly our best hair mask: Keraphix Hair Masque for Damaged Hair—our favorite deep conditioning hair treatment. A leader in salon-quality hair products, Nexxus uses learnings from science and nature. We know that hair is made of almost 90% proteins, which is why we use advanced scientific methods to identify the protein needs of each hair type and create customized formulas with proteins to bring your hair back to life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nexxus Keraphix Conditioner features a complex rich in protein and nutrients known to provide softness and to nourish severely damaged hair. Continued use with the full Keraphix system increases the resilience of hair’s cortex, delivering a smooth, conditioned feel.

The Science Bleaching, chemical processing, and rigorous heat styling can severely damage hair both inside and out. Through advanced protein science, Nexxus’ strengthening keratin formula reaches into the hair fiber, repairing it from within The Ingredients We discovered that Glutamic acid is a key amino acid lost when hair is damaged. From this, Keraphix features a ProteinFusion blend with keratin protein and glutamic acid rich black rice to bring hair back to life The Results Nexxus delivers salon quality results with our Keraphix collection that is clinically proven to repair internal hair damage, leaving hair repaired, revitalized, and visibly healthier

Nexxus Keraphix Damage Healing Shampoo, 33.8 oz Nexxus Keraphix Damage Healing Treatment Masque, 1.5 oz Nexxus Keraphix Damage Repair Treatment Cream, 6 oz Main Benefit Clinically proven to deliver internal repair to severely damaged hair from the very first use, Nexxus Keraphix Damage Healing Shampoo helps heal rough and brittle hair. This deep-conditioning treatment envelopes the hair surface with an ultra-fine firm to restore the protective barrier and heal visible signs of severe hair damage. This Damage Repair Treatment Cream features an exclusive re-bonding technology to repair severely damaged hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will buy again
reviews.reviewText: This product feels great ony hair feels healthier shinier no shredding and super soft...great for curly hair a must buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Authentic product finally!
reviews.reviewText: When I bought the 3 pack set with shampoo and 3 hair masks - it was an awful smell and my bleached hair fell out on the only time I tried it. I repurchased this one and it came the same day. Remember the REAL one has a perfume ( a great smell that lets you know it’s a real Nexxus product) like smell and makes even over processed hair feel like butter every upon first application. If it has no smell don’t use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Favorite shampoo/conditioner! Always leaves my hair feeling hydrated and smelling good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the condition but the pump does not work. In order to use it I have to take the top off and squeeze the conditioner out onto my hand. Not very convenient at all but cannot figure out why it won’t pump I turned it but it doesn’t release.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! What a noticeable difference in my hair!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the shampoo on Amazon and was so impressed with it, that I decided to try out the conditioner. Wow! My hair is so soft and "fluffy." It now has bounce and lift and is incredibly soft. I live in Florida and the summer humidity makes my hair do crazy stuff, but with this shampoo and conditioner I am able to tame it. I knocked off a point for the scent because for me, I'm not 100% crazy about it. It's nice, but not as nice as the shampoo. I wish they were both the same scent. I will be purchasing more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The best conditioner ever!!! But know it is heavy fire. Not for fine or greasy hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice for my hair. Smells good performs better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was using drug store shampoo and my hair was very static-y and dry looking. I splurged on Nexxus and my hair is super soft again. 10/10 recommend.

Leí las reseñas y pensé que exageraban. La verdad es que si es muy bueno. La marca siempre me ha gustado y antes la encontraba en el súper Mercado. Pero en Amazon tiene mejor precio y la presentación es grande. Deja el cabello lacio, no necesitas secadora parece que lo planchaste. El aroma es muy rico. Con poco alcanza para todo el cabello, lo tengo hasta la cintura. Yo usaba el blanco, pero esta definitivamente es el mejor. No genera friz.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality Look locally for it, will save you money.
reviews.reviewText: I noticed after buying this shampoo and conditioner that I can get it at the pharmacy for much less. I do love the shampoo and conditioner though.
I don’t colour my hair and my natural grey- salt and pepper hair look so good! Darker, shiner and no styling required.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sólo para uso en pelo daño grado 5.
reviews.reviewText: Leí las reseñas anteriores,tenía dudas pero tiene pro y contras, pros: a un precio inmejorable, de verdad funciona dejando suave mi pelo obvio después del shampoo de la misma línea,tienes que usar muy poca cantidad en el momento de aplicarlo y enjuagar la suavidad inmejorable.Contras: el perfume es muy intenso y para mi puede llegar a marear,si no tienes daño extremo en tu cabello no lo uses de hecho el pelo se siente graso al salir de la ducha,usarlo solo de medios a puntas, si te pones abarcando cuero cabelludo te puede dejar la raíz muy grasosa.En conclusión para pelo muy dañado es excelente si tu pelo no esta tan dañado no lo recomendaría y de hecho lo especifica dice para grado de daño 5.

Très bon résultat, sa ne se compare pas au shampoing à la pharmacie, à première vue semble dispendieux, mais la quantité prise pour un shampooing prend tout sont sens en plus d'une qualité de cheveux.ma fille a énormément de cheveux et avec des shampoings bas de gamme sont cuir chevelu était eriter ,sûrement du a un mauvais rinçage, en réalité c'est les résidus qu'il laissait, avec cette marque 3 shampoing et sont fond de tête est revenu à la normale, j'ai pas changé de fille lol juste de qualité de shampoing
